name: The Zoomies
description:
A/D or Left/Right to rotate Dog, presses have a 0.5 second cooldown.

Lead the dog to collect all the bones, and step in as little poo as you can!

Source code available on GitHub

Extra Credits:

  • monogram font by datagoblin
  • Music by John Schmit, Kendall Schmit
  • Dog face, pile of poo, and bone emojis from OpenMoji
  • Skybox texture by rpgwhitelock
